work.occupation: Professional criminal, owner and president of Osborn Industries
work.base: H.A.M.M.E.R. base; formerly Avengers Tower, New York City, New York

connections.groupAffiliation: H.A.M.M.E.R., leader of the Dark Avengers; formerly Thunderbolts, The Cabal; Former leader of the Sinister Twelve, partner of Mendell Stromm, Crime Master, employer of the Enforcers, Hellfire Club
connections.relatives: Alton Osborn, Sr. (paternal great-grandfather, deceased);Alton Osborn, Jr. (paternal grandfather, deceased);Amberson Osborn (father, deceased);Emily Osborn (wife, deceased);Gabriel Stacy (son);Sarah Stacy (daughter);Harry Osborn (Green Goblin II, son);Liz Allan (ex-daughter-in-law);Normie Osborn (grandson);Stanley Osborn (grandson);
